info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 3:48PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Greenville, northeastern Anderson and east central Pickens Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 347 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Easley, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Easley, Powdersville, Piedmont, West Pelzer, Liberty, Williamston and Northlake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
